overview: Sergeant Wellington and his Privates hit the locker room for some physical training. Sarge puts the grunts through a series of calisthenics, then orders them to wrestle each other and him! Bulging muscles pulse with strain as they grapple for dominance. Sarge next orders them to suit up for water exercises, but before they can hit the pool, he dares Brody and Cruz to a personal match. Can they take him down? At the end of the day the soldiers hit the showers. Each blows off the tensions of the day by stroking out a fat load of cum!
title: Military Lockerroom
